title: Plaza Day
description: Visit our stall at UCT Plaza Day! Meet the committee, grab some swag, and sign up for the society.

title: Opening Event
description: Official welcome event for new members. Introduction to the year's roadmap and networking.

title: Basics of Quantum Computing
description: An introductory lecture on Qubits, Superposition, and Entanglement. No physics background required!

title: Qiskit Hands-on Workshop
description: Bring your laptops! We will write our first quantum circuits using IBM Qiskit and run them on real hardware.

title: Quantum Games Night
description: Relax before exams with Quantum Chess and other science-themed board games. Pizza provided!

title: Qiskit Global Summer School
description: Two-week intensive summer school hosted globally by IBM. Viewing parties and study groups available.

title: Meet & Greet
description: Post-vac catchup. Share what you learned during the summer school and meet new members.

title: Quantum Talk / Outing
description: Field trip to a local research lab or a guest lecture from an industry expert.

title: Qiskit Fall Fest
description: A student-led festival celebrating quantum computing. Hackathon, talks, and prizes!

title: UCT QCS AGM
description: Annual General Meeting to elect the new committee and reflect on the year.

title: End Year Celebration
description: Closing the year with a bang! Awards ceremony and social dinner.
